# The `IRNormalizer` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-irnormalizer-cpp-/irnormalizer">IRNormalizer</a> aims to transform LLVM IR into normal form. <a href="#details">More...</a>

<SectionDefinition>

## Naming.

### foldInstructionName {#ae7778d3996635b865b4f984a4c206cad}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void IRNormalizer::foldInstructionName (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42; I) const</>}>
Shortens instruction&#39;s name.

This method removes called function name from the instruction name and substitutes the call chain with a corresponding list of operands.

Examples: op00000Callee(op00001Callee(...), vl00000Callee(1, 2), ...) -&gt; op00000(op00001, vl00000, ...) vl00000Callee(1, 2) -&gt; vl00000(1, 2)

This method omits output instructions and pre-output (instructions directly used by an output instruction) instructions (by default). By default it also does not affect user named instructions.


<ParametersList title="Parameters">
<ParametersListItem name="I"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> whose name will be folded.</ParametersListItem>
</ParametersList>

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/utils/irnormalizer-cpp/#l00071">71</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/utils/irnormalizer-cpp">IRNormalizer.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### nameAsInitialInstruction {#a137687412584c3815d30b20ff8a3fa77}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void IRNormalizer::nameAsInitialInstruction (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42; I) const</>}>
Names instruction following the scheme: vl00000Callee(Operands)

Where 00000 is a hash calculated considering instruction&#39;s opcode and output footprint. Callee&#39;s name is only included when instruction&#39;s type is <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/callinst">CallInst</a>. In cases where instruction is commutative, operands list is also sorted.

Renames instruction only when RenameAll flag is raised or instruction is unnamed.


<SectionUser title="See Also">
getOutputFootprint()
</SectionUser>


<ParametersList title="Parameters">
<ParametersListItem name="I"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> to be renamed.</ParametersListItem>
</ParametersList>

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/utils/irnormalizer-cpp/#l00069">69</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/utils/irnormalizer-cpp">IRNormalizer.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### nameAsRegularInstruction {#a76a70088a3d58525c470b2e7dadbf6b1}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void IRNormalizer::nameAsRegularInstruction (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42; I)</>}>
Names instruction following the scheme: op00000Callee(Operands)

Where 00000 is a hash calculated considering instruction&#39;s opcode, its operands&#39; opcodes and order. Callee&#39;s name is only included when instruction&#39;s type is <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/callinst">CallInst</a>. In cases where instruction is commutative, operand list is also sorted.

Names instructions recursively in accordance with the def-use tree, starting from the initial instructions (defs), finishing at the output (top-most user) instructions (depth-first).

Renames instruction only when RenameAll flag is raised or instruction is unnamed.


<SectionUser title="See Also">
getOutputFootprint()
</SectionUser>


<ParametersList title="Parameters">
<ParametersListItem name="I"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> to be renamed.</ParametersListItem>
</ParametersList>

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/utils/irnormalizer-cpp/#l00070">70</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/utils/irnormalizer-cpp">IRNormalizer.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### reorderInstructionOperandsByNames {#ade39e68d6b734c0bb620f639e213bd03}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void IRNormalizer::reorderInstructionOperandsByNames (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42; I) const</>}>
Reorders instruction&#39;s operands alphabetically.

This method assumes that passed instruction is commutative. Changing the operand order in other instructions may change the semantics.


<ParametersList title="Parameters">
<ParametersListItem name="I"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> whose operands will be reordered.</ParametersListItem>
</ParametersList>

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/utils/irnormalizer-cpp/#l00080">80</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/utils/irnormalizer-cpp">IRNormalizer.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### reorderInstructions {#aa8f279ce9fe7b7fa5e3d2994253ef7d6}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void IRNormalizer::reorderInstructions (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function">Function</a> &amp; F) const</>}>
Reorders instructions by walking up the tree from each operand of an output instruction and reducing the def-use distance.

This method assumes that output instructions were collected top-down, otherwise the def-use chain may be broken. This method is a wrapper for recursive reorderInstruction().


<SectionUser title="See Also">
reorderInstruction()
</SectionUser>

## Utility methods.

### collectOutputInstructions {#a457830d297e8ce441775a4702befb8f7}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>SmallVector&lt; Instruction &#42;, 16 &gt; IRNormalizer::collectOutputInstructions (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function">Function</a> &amp; F) const</>}>
Returns a vector of output instructions.

An output is an instruction which has side-effects or is <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/returninst">ReturnInst</a>. Uses isOutput().


<SectionUser title="See Also">
isOutput()
</SectionUser>


<ParametersList title="Parameters">
<ParametersListItem name="F"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function">Function</a> to collect outputs from.</ParametersListItem>
</ParametersList>

### getOutputFootprint {#aa91dfeeb0f0b6cb429ff014daf9005ce}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>SetVector&lt; int &gt; IRNormalizer::getOutputFootprint (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42; I, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallptrset">SmallPtrSet</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42;, 32 &gt; &amp; Visited) const</>}>
Helper method returning indices (distance from the beginning of the basic block) of outputs using the <code>I</code> (eliminates repetitions).

Walks down the def-use tree recursively.
